statements: SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%';
SELECT MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location = 'Garden' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, location, moisture_level, timestamp FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-06-01' AND timestamp <= '2021-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level < 3;
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location <> 'Indoor';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM SoilMoistureData
SELECT * FROM SensorMetadata
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, deployment_date FROM SensorMetadata
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%' ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(sensor_id), location FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, deployment_date FROM SensorMetadata WHERE manufacturer = 'Example Inc.' ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level, timestamp FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level < 30 OR moisture_level > 70 ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data;
SELECT sensor_id, soil_moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE soil_moisture_level > 50;
SELECT device_name, activation_date FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY activation_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sensor_id, analysis_result FROM analyzed_data WHERE analyzed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_location, soil_moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_location='Garden' AND soil_moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_location, timestamp FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM sensor_devices WHERE activation_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT sensor_id, analysis_result, analyzed_by FROM analyzed_data ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM Fields WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_type, location FROM Fields WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND location = 'Iowa';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level, date_time FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY moisture_level DESC
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM Fields WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number, location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, smd.moisture_level FROM Sensors s INNER JOIN SoilMoistureData smd ON s.sensor_id = smd.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 5;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, acreage FROM FieldInfo WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type FROM FarmEquipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 5.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT schedule_id, startTime FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FieldInfo WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND acreage > 100 ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, last_maintenance_date FROM FarmEquipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-03-15' OR equipment_type = 'Tractor';
